meanings.sent1: I commingled the colors to create a new shade.
meanings.sent2: She commingled the ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: The artist commingled the paint colors and created a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the dish commingled perfectly, creating a unique taste.
meanings.sent5: The sounds of nature commingled harmoniously in the forest.

meanings.definition: Combine different elements into a single entity
meanings.sent1: The company commingled its resources to launch a new product.
meanings.sent2: They commingled their strengths to overcome the challenge.
meanings.sent3: The magician commingled various objects to perform a surprising trick.
meanings.sent4: The rivers commingled at the delta, forming a larger stream.
meanings.sent5: The diverse cultures commingled in the vibrant city, creating a rich tapestry of traditions.
